verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}(sisters echo on verses) I will worship With all of my heart I will praise You With all of my strength I will seek You All of my days I will follow All of Your ways.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will give You all my worship I will give You all my praise You alone I long to worship You alone are worthy of my praise{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will bow down Hail You as King I will serve You Give You everything I will lift up My eyes to Your throne I will trust You Trust You alone{/lang-eng}
